document_data.name: Sundamar's Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Sundamar's Tower''' was a mage tower found in [[Myth Drannor]], and the personal residence of the eccentric [[wizard]] [[Sundamar]].{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves|76}}
document_data.Location: The tower was located high above [[Eldansyr's Ride]], in the city's [[Sheshyrinnam]] district.{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves/Map}}
document_data.Structure:
The four-story stone tower was not built atop the ground, or even as an addition to one of the city's massive [[shadowtop]]s, but rather appeared to grow out of the prolific and appropriately-named Towersclutch Tree.

The foundation of the tower rest some {{SI|40|ft}} above ground level, offering little protection against winds that regularly shook the branches of the tree, and the tower with them.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Some people believed that the tower's unique construction was not entirely intentional, and may have been a result of one of Sundamar's failed experiments, perhaps one involving [[spelljammer|spelljamming]]-related [[magic]]s.
